review_text: I got this so I am able to carry snacks on the weekends. We are never home so when I saw this I had to get this. First our toddler loves curious George and second it was just darling. Item looked just like picture. Best part so easy to clean with just a wipe. It's perfect in size not too big or small. Perfect for on the go.
product_name: Curious George Tin Keepsake Box with Latch by Schylling
